name: Easy Condensed Milk Cake
author: Olaahmed
summary: You need only 5 ingredients for this super-easy cake. Serve with fresh fruit and berry sauce.
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix 1 cup plus 3 tablespoons flour and baking powder together in a large bowl
Combine sweetened condensed milk, eggs, and melted butter in a bowl and add to the flour mixture
Beat using an electric mixer until batter is smooth and creamy
Pour batter into the prepared springform pan
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 45 minutes
Cool on a wire rack for 5 minutes
Run a table knife around the edges to loosen
Invert cake carefully onto a serving plate or cooling rack
Dust with confectioners' sugar before serving
